DIV1.HEAD: PREFACE.
DIV1.P: YOU have all immortal souls, something within you which will live forever in another world, either in a state of eternal hap∣piness or eternal misery; and since your peace and comfort here, as well as blessedness hereafter, depends in a great measure upon your good be∣haviour towards God and man, I have drawn up a few rules for your conduct: — Endeavour all you can to keep them in your mind, and pray to God continually for his grace to preserve you from the many temptations and follies to which childhood and youth are exposed.

LG.L: Be modest and sober, courteous and free;
Always good to your parents, and all that you see.
The poor and the wretched, pray never despise;
Attend to the counsel of those that are wise.
In your dress and your Actions, let neatness appear;
Let your words all be innocent, kind and sincere.

DIV1.P: Quest. 1. WHO made you, and all things▪
Answ. GOD.
Q 2. What is GOD▪
A. GOD is a Spirit, who sees all thing▪ and takes notice of all I think, say, or do.
Q. 3. What did God make you for?
A. To love, serve, and obey him.
Q 4. How must you love, serve, and obey od?

Q. 5. What are God's commandments?
